ygData.msgSnippet: Kinger, can you please elaborate on how the council base is designed? ... Killfest frowns, recieving DrillBit s transmission. Very well, he replies, looking

Kinger, can you please elaborate on how the council base is designed?

::Killfest::

Killfest frowns, recieving DrillBit's transmission.

"Very well," he replies, looking over at DarkMouse as he closes the 
transmission for a sec.

"Don't fire on DrillBit, he'll be helping us a bit while he's useful."

"Allright then, who are we up against?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He thought for a moment. Killfest might do something rash. He 
opened a
> comm.
> "Killfest, since we both lead a good number of bots, I propose that 
we
> enter a co-leadership. Do you except?"
